wikipedia_page.main: Dr Edith Philip Smith FLS DSc FRSE (9 March 1897 – 17 May 1976) was a botanist and teacher who became a fellow of the Royal Society of Edinburgh and Head of the Botany Department at Queen's College, Dundee (now the University of Dundee).

response: Pantin was married to botanist Edith Philip Smith.
